## HttpFS.normalizePath() method

Normalizes a VFS path for HTTP use.

Behavior: - Applies `urlResolver` if provided. - If the result is a data URI or an object URL, it is returned as-is. - Otherwise falls back to the base VFS `normalizePath` logic.

**Signature:**

```typescript
normalizePath(path: string): string;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

path


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Input VFS path or URL-like string.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

Normalized path or URL.
